commit message: Merge branch 'release/V4.6.1' into develop

Initial calculation of H-Index
Allow h-index to be displayed from Plays menu

Option to display absolute datetime in forums

Update release notes

When starting to log a play, Location gets the focus by default, showing the keyboard, letting added fields also so the keyboard.

Merge branch 'develop' into feature/log-plays

Reset branch version name
Correct param name in PreferencesUtils
Consider a play started within 2 hours of the previous play ending as part of the same session, and copy the location and players to the new play

When continuing a session, set the players's starting positions
Add a clear players menu option
Change content provider to use a query parameter instead of a fragment to get player names; only retrieve names that are associated with an empty user name.
When logging a play, only focus on the location if it's visible, a new play, and no location already set
Only group on projections that don't cast into a named colum (that is, missing the AS) - this is probably still not completely correct, but seems to be working in all known cases
When adding players for the first time, show a dialog with the most common players listed first
In the Add Players dialog, filter based on location (if provided)
Make 'cancel' on the Add Players dialog work properly
Ability to add color to a game; update release notes
When continuing a session, correctly populate players without a username
Add new supported colors: tan, ivory, silver, gold&
Alter some hint text and put the add field menu in proper order
